name: Reimu's dreamlike introspection
description:
Reimu's dreamlike introspection,

A very long name for a small rpg maker project about Touhou.

Help Reimu heal by going through 3 of her dreams !

Game made during the Touhou Game Jam 8, in 3 days, with Yume Nikki as main inspiration.

to play the game, you need to extract "touhougamejam8.lzh", and run RPG_RT

if RTP is required, you can take RTP here : https://dl.degica.com/rpgmakerweb/run-time-packages/rpg2003_rtp_installer.zip

made by youli

"It's my first game I can't believe it".

playtest, music and translation by Clémencipé

"awouinwouinwouin"
